Amsterdam/Boulder & Remote (EU)

Stream provides APIs for in-app chat and video calling. We're are used by thousands of companies and reach over a billion end users. Tech is based on Go, Redis, CockroachDB, some Raft & RocksDB. Company is default alive, 120 people, Go roles open from 3-4 years of experience up to principal/director level. Also willing to train experienced backend devs coming from other languages like Python/Ruby etc on Go (Golang). Also offer relocation packages to Amsterdam, typically easy to get a visa arranged for tech roles in The Netherlands.

https://getstream.io/team/#jobs
